## ğŸ¯ Quick Actions

### For Developers

#### Check PR Session Status
```bash
# View your PR's automation status
gh pr view YOUR_PR_NUMBER
```

#### Trigger PR Automation
```bash
./scripts/manage-workflows.sh trigger pr-session-management
```

### For Maintainers

#### Run Health Check
```bash
./scripts/manage-workflows.sh trigger master-automation-orchestrator
```

#### View Workflow Status
```bash
gh run list --limit 20
```

#### Validate All Workflows
```bash
./scripts/manage-workflows.sh validate
```

## ğŸ”§ Configuration

### Required Secrets

These secrets must be configured in repository settings:

- âœ… `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` - Claude AI API key
- âœ… `N8N_WEBHOOK_URL` - N8N webhook endpoint
- âœ… `GITHUB_TOKEN` - Auto-provided by GitHub Actions

### Environment Variables

Standard environment variables used across workflows:

```yaml
NODE_ENV: production
PORT: 3000
ENABLE_COMPUTER_USE: true
ENABLE_ANDROID: false
```

## ğŸ’¡ Best Practices

### For PR Authors
1. âœ… Keep PRs focused and small
2. âœ… Respond to automation feedback
3. âœ… Address failing checks promptly
4. âœ… Add `auto-merge` label when ready

### For Reviewers
1. âœ… Review within 24 hours
2. âœ… Check automation results
3. âœ… Approve when all checks pass
4. âœ… Use PR templates

### For Maintainers
1. âœ… Monitor daily health reports
2. âœ… Review automation alerts
3. âœ… Keep workflows updated
4. âœ… Document configuration changes

## ğŸ”„ Workflow Lifecycle

```mermaid
graph LR
    A[PR Opened] --> B[Session Created]
    B --> C[Tests Run]
    C --> D{All Pass?}
    D -->|Yes| E[Ready for Review]
    D -->|No| F[Author Fixes]
    F --> C
    E --> G[Approved]
    G --> H{Auto-merge?}
    H -->|Yes| I[Merged]
    H -->|No| J[Manual Merge]
    I --> K[Session Closed]
    J --> K
```
